questions.question: Alcohol can hurt children.
questions.result: YES - Your body is still growing and drugs and alcohol can really hurt it.

questions.question: Alcohol can make people sick, cause car crashes, and get them into problems with the law.
(__________) of 8th graders have admitted to being intoxicated at least once.
Smoking cigarettes is NOT harmful.
questions.result: NO - Smoking can hurt the lungs and heart.

questions.question: Cigarettes contain a drug called nicotine that makes it very hard for people to stop smoking.
More than 1 of every (__________) high school students reported in 2019 that they used electronic cigarettes in the past 30 days.
(__________) individuals aged 12 to 17 abused prescription drugs at least once.
Is abusing prescription drugs illegal?
questions.result: YES - It is illegal to use prescriptin drugs without a valid prescription or to distribute them.

questions.question: Taking illegal drugs only affects the person taking them.
questions.result: NO - It can also have an affect on the person's family, friends, co-workers, and others.

questions.question: Once a person is addicted to drugs, it's very easy for them to stop.
questions.result: NO - Stopping can cause withdrawal symptoms, such as vomiting (throwing up), sweating, and tremors (shaking).
